result.execSummary:
The defendant Alexander Kawika Gryskiewicz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- $243 Court Costs. Payable to Clerk of Court.
- $200 DNA Sample and Surcharge. Payable through Clerk of Court.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexander Kawika Gryskiewicz

records.addlTxt: Order for payment on July 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
ec: DA, c: SCSO, DE via mail w/ OFP.  gll

01:42 PM  CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius for today     Alexander Kawika Gryskiewicz appeared. Set for INIT. DE confirms address and DOB. DE understands charges and possible penalties. DE would like to represent himself. Off record at 1;43 PM. Recalled at 2:00 PM. Appearances as previously stated. Atty Satorius recites agreement. ADA Ellenwood agrees. Defendant pleads guilty to Count 1. S/T Defendant. Court finds that Defendant has knowningly and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights including right to counsel. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty to Count 1. 

Court Orders:

Count 1

- Court Costs: $243     60 DTP.
- DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200    60 DTP.

Adjourned at 2:07 PM.  gll
